<item>
<title>World's largest solar-powered computer</title>
<guid>http://www.cnn.com/2016/05/09/africa/watly-solar-hub-ghana/index.html</guid>
<link>http://rss.cnn.com/r/797c283ee3/0L0Scnn0Bcom0C20A160C0A50C0A90Cafrica0Cwatly0Esolar0Ehub0Eghana0Cindex0Bhtml0Deref0Frss0Itech</link>
<description>Touted by its creators as the "world's largest solar-powered computer," it could offer a quantum leap for development across rural Africa.<Br><Br><a href="http://podcast.cnn.com" rel="nofollow"><img src="http://podcasts.cnn.net/cnnpodcasts/feeds/images/300-ac360.jpg"></a></description>
<pubDate>Mon, 09 May 2016 10:00:39 EDT</pubDate>
<media:thumbnail height="51" width="90" url="http://i2.cdn.turner.com/cnn/dam/assets/160503155714-matteo-squizzato-and-stefano-buiani-from-watly-in-ghana-top-tease.jpg"/>
<media:content height="51" width="90" medium="image" type="image/jpeg" url="http://i2.cdn.turner.com/cnn/dam/assets/160503155714-matteo-squizzato-and-stefano-buiani-from-watly-in-ghana-top-tease.jpg"/>
</item>
<item>
<title>'The Martian' would live here</title>
<guid>http://www.cnn.com/2016/05/05/tech/way-up-there-where-will-we-live-space/index.html</guid>
<link>http://rss.cnn.com/r/797c283ee3/0L0Scnn0Bcom0C20A160C0A50C0A50Ctech0Cway0Eup0Ethere0Ewhere0Ewill0Ewe0Elive0Espace0Cindex0Bhtml0Deref0Frss0Itech</link>
<description>In sci-fi movies, space habitats are huge structures with labyrinth layouts. But Hollywood doesn't have to deal with the issues real aerospace engineers face when contemplating future space homes -- such as gravity and financial constraints. </description>
<pubDate>Thu, 05 May 2016 13:11:26 EDT</pubDate>
<media:thumbnail height="51" width="90" url="http://i2.cdn.turner.com/cnn/dam/assets/160408120419-way-up-there-space-hab-exteriors-top-tease.jpg"/>
<media:content height="51" width="90" medium="image" type="image/jpeg" url="http://i2.cdn.turner.com/cnn/dam/assets/160408120419-way-up-there-space-hab-exteriors-top-tease.jpg"/>
</item>

It's time to step into the world of virtual reality.<br><Br>Sponsored:<br> <b>Drivers With No Tickets In 3 Years Read This</b> <br> <a href="http://www.dailyconsumerlife.com/articles/auto/?t202id=5141&t202kw=" target="_blank">Do NOT pay your next car insurance bill until you try this.</a> <Br><Br></description>
